mapper.select:
SELECT p.place_no, p.title, p.introduction, p.sbst, p.postcode, p.address, p.roadaddress, p.phoneno, p.alltag, p.tag, p.longitude, p.latitude, p.reg_date, p.edit_date, p.image, p.thumbnail
,l.like_no
FROM places AS p
title LIKE concat('%', #{title}, '%')
OR introduction LIKE concat('%', #{introduction}, '%')
OR alltag LIKE concat('%', #{alltag}, '%')
OR tag LIKE concat('%', #{tag}, '%')
LEFT OUTER JOIN likes AS l ON p.place_no = l.ref_id AND ref_type='P' AND member_no = #{member_no}
ORDER BY place_no DESC
LIMIT ${offset},${listCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM places
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO places (title,introduction,sbst,postcode,address,roadaddress,phoneno, alltag, tag, longitude,latitude, reg_date, edit_date, image, thumbnail) VALUES (#{title}, #{introduction}, #{sbst}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{roadaddress}, #{phoneno}, #{alltag}, #{tag}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{reg_date}, #{edit_date}, #{image}, #{thumbnail});
